favourite.article: My father in law and I used to sing this song as a duet and later my husband and I sang it as a duet. We only sang verse 1,3, & 4....It is a beautiful and meaningful song. In reading scripture this morning, it was about following Jesus and it brought this song to my mind....
I can hear the crying violins in lines 5-7 of each verse. I especially like verse 1, For thee I trod the bitter way... Therefore I want to follow Him all the way.
